# cmccloudv2_dns_acl (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create DNS ACL
resource "cmccloudv2_dns_acl" "acl1" {
	zone_id     = "8dda9b63-3cfa-4b35-98ad-a495e6e1d052"
	record_type = "A"
	domain      = "sub.example.com"
	source_ip   = "1.2.5.0/24"
	action      = "block"  # allow, block
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) The domain of the DNS ACL
- `record_type` (String) The type of the DNS record
- `source_ip` (String) The source IP of the DNS ACL
- `zone_id` (String) The ID of the DNS zone

### Optional

- `action` (String) The action of the DNS ACL
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The created time of the DNS ACL
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `updated_at` (String) The updated time of the DNS ACL

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
